mapper.select:
select , , ,
from supplier sp inner join suppliertype su on sp.suptypeid = su.suptypeid inner join address ad on sp.addressid = ad.addressid inner join store st on sp.sId = st.s_id where sp.suppliername like CONCAT('%',#{suppliername},'%')

select id, supplier_code, suppliername, contacts, contactnumber, suptypeid, addressid, s_id, payablemoney, Paid_money, s_store, money, statik, ismoren, lxaddress, cjtime, beizhu from asms.supplier limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.supplier(supplier_code, suppliername, contacts, contactnumber, suptypeid, addressid, s_id, payablemoney, Paid_money, s_store, money, statik, ismoren, lxaddress, cjtime, beizhu) values (#{supplierCode}, #{suppliername}, #{contacts}, #{contactnumber}, #{suptypeid}, #{addressid}, #{sId}, #{payablemoney}, #{paidMoney}, #{sStore}, #{money}, #{statik}, #{ismoren}, #{lxaddress}, #{cjtime}, #{beizhu})

insert into asms.supplier(supplier_code, suppliername, contacts, contactnumber, suptypeid, addressid, s_id, payablemoney, Paid_money, s_store, money, statik, ismoren, lxaddress, cjtime, beizhu) values
(#{entity.supplierCode}, #{entity.suppliername}, #{entity.contacts}, #{entity.contactnumber}, #{entity.suptypeid}, #{entity.addressid}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.payablemoney}, #{entity.paidMoney}, #{entity.sStore}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.statik}, #{entity.ismoren}, #{entity.lxaddress}, #{entity.cjtime}, #{entity.beizhu})

insert into asms.supplier(supplier_code, suppliername, contacts, contactnumber, suptypeid, addressid, s_id, payablemoney, Paid_money, s_store, money, statik, ismoren, lxaddress, cjtime, beizhu) values
(#{entity.supplierCode}, #{entity.suppliername}, #{entity.contacts}, #{entity.contactnumber}, #{entity.suptypeid}, #{entity.addressid}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.payablemoney}, #{entity.paidMoney}, #{entity.sStore}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.statik}, #{entity.ismoren}, #{entity.lxaddress}, #{entity.cjtime}, #{entity.beizhu})
on duplicate key update supplier_code = values(supplier_code) , suppliername = values(suppliername) , contacts = values(contacts) , contactnumber = values(contactnumber) , suptypeid = values(suptypeid) , addressid = values(addressid) , s_id = values(s_id) , payablemoney = values(payablemoney) , Paid_money = values(Paid_money) , s_store = values(s_store) , money = values(money) , statik = values(statik) , ismoren = values(ismoren) , lxaddress = values(lxaddress) , cjtime = values(cjtime) , beizhu = values(beizhu)
mapper.update:
update asms.supplier
supplier_code = #{supplierCode},
suppliername = #{suppliername},
contacts = #{contacts},
contactnumber = #{contactnumber},
suptypeid = #{suptypeid},
addressid = #{addressid},
s_id = #{sId},
payablemoney = #{payablemoney},
Paid_money = #{paidMoney},
s_store = #{sStore},
money = #{money},
statik = #{statik},
ismoren = #{ismoren},
lxaddress = #{lxaddress},
cjtime = #{cjtime},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
where id = #{id}
